label: Sinai Arabic NF M 8, Undertext (Greek majuscule)

layout.columns: Number of lines per page is impossible to reconstruct (Rossetto)

note.value: Description of undertext by Agamemnon Tselikas, Nigel Wilson, Giulia Rossetto

Bibliography: Biliography: Wellmann M. 1958 (ed.), Pedanii Dioscuridis Anazarbei De Materia Medica Libri quinque, I–III, Berlin ; G. Boudalis, G. Rossetto, Colour Mapping of Sin. ar. NF 8 + Sin. ar. NF 28, in: The Apollonius of Tyre Fragment in Arabic NF 8: Studies of a Latin Palimpsest at St Catherine’s Monastery, Sinai, ed. M. P. Brown, J. Lockhart. Forthcoming ; G. Rossetto, Classical Texts Among the Palimpsests of the Monastery of St. Catherine (Sinai): An Overview, in: New Light on Old Manuscripts: The Sinai Palimpsests and Other Advances in Palimpsest Studies, ed. C. Rapp – G. Rossetto – J. Grusková – G. Kessel. Forthcoming
